trans-unit.source: As long as it's your turn, CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to 2 plus the number of Swamps your opponents control. As long as it's not your turn, CARDNAME's power and toughness are each 2.
trans-unit.target: 在你的回合中，CARDNAME之力量和防御力皆等于所有对手所操控的沼泽数加2。在其他回合中，CARDNAME之力量和防御力皆等于2。

trans-unit.source: First strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

DRK·22 | Dance of Many | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a token that's a copy of target nontoken creature.
When CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, exile the token.
When the token leaves the battlefield, sacrifice CARDNAME.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice CARDNAME unless you pay {U}{U}.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，支付oUoU，否则埋葬CARDNAME。\n当你使用CARDNAME时，选择目标召唤牌。当CARDNAME进场时，放置一个衍生物进场，将该衍生物视为该召唤牌的完整复制品。若CARDNAME或是该衍生物其中一者离场，则埋葬另一者。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进场，且于你的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two Islands. If you do, untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你可以牺牲两个海岛。 若你如此做，则重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't attack unless you sacrifice two Islands. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)
trans-unit.target: 除非你牺牲两个海岛，否则CARDNAME不能攻击。

trans-unit.source: Each player may discard up to three cards. CARDNAME deals damage to each player equal to 3 minus the number of cards they discarded this way.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对每名玩家造成3点伤害。每名玩家皆可选择弃掉一张牌，以防止CARDNAME对他造成的1点伤害。每名玩家最多可因此弃掉三张牌。
